Name: (Custom) Friendly Competition
Description: Get the key and be the first to the door to earn points and bragging rights! Only 25 rounds to escape...
Longdesc: Friendly Competition v1.7 by BobtheBunny You only have 25 rounds to complete the game. Be the first to grab the key and get to the door! Watch out for the other heroes, they want the key too! Toss bones, teleport lamps, and use your cunning wit to hinder the other heroes. -------------- Suggested Rules: Call a truce until the key is found. Banish refreshes in 5 turns; use it on yourself at the start to scatter the heroes. Use Banish only on yourself. If you die, will you wait for the next floor or rejoin the game? -------------- Maps and bosses are determined by the Demeo Book chosen. All monsters are weaker and may do unexpected things! Each Hero has more health and 3 rounds to be revived or crawl towards help! Strike Lamps to gain immunities and other effects. Focus Potions cause Tangled when they wear off. Courage is a 3x3 radius and counts as hitting another player or players and (possibly) yourself. Sneak costs 0 Action Points. Stats increase to a maximum of +5, and Strength and Swiftness increase +2 each time. -------------- Guardian: Priotitizes survivability and utility. Hunter: Roots, beasts, and tricks. Assassin: Blades, alchemy, and speed. Sorcerer: Elemental spells and destruction. Bard: Songs, scrolls, tornados, and water. Warlock: Strange magics gifted from an ancient source. Barbarian: Hooks lamps, prone to anger and corruption. ---------------- What's the Point? +1 point for damaging enemies +1 point for slaying enemies +1 point for opening doors +2 point for picking up gold +2 points for damaging another player +3 points for opening chests +4 points for looting potion stands +4 points for reviving another player (they lose 4 points) +6 points for using a fountain +8 points for slaying/downing another player +1 BONUS point for anything above while you have the key -5 points if you hurt yourself -10 points if you kill yourself +3 points if you hurt a boss +20 points maximum for unlocking the exit door (-1 point each turn you hold the key) +25 points for striking the killing blow on a boss
